projects.title: Elliptical Curve Calculator
projects.description: The Elliptical Curve Calculator is an online tool that helps users perform mathematical operations and calculations related to elliptic curves.

projects.title: Real Time weather Analyzer
projects.description: This website provides live  weather information, ensuring users have access to real-time weather updates for their location. It offers the accurate weather data available online.

projects.title: Quote Generator
projects.description: The Quote Generator is a user-friendly web tool, instantly delivering random quotes from the Quotable API and enabling easy sharing on Twitter.
